message.content:
cs.SD, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.SY

The paper deals with the generation of music using machine learning techniques, specifically Convolutional Restricted Boltzmann Machines (C-RBMs). This falls under the sub-category of Sound and Music Computing (cs.SD). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of constraints and optimization techniques to control the generation process, which is related to Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Statistical Learning (cs.LG). The use of Simulated Annealing to guide the sampling process is also related to Optimization and Control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper deals with the higher-level structure of the generated music, including self-similarity, meter, and tonal properties, which falls under the sub-category of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI).
